ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istrg.1 | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | istdrg.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_istdrg | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp3bi | |- ( R e. TopDRing -> ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) |
